mapper.select: select u.uid, u.nickname, u.description, u.avatar, u.status, IF(EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM follow f2 WHERE f2.follower_id = f.followee_id AND f2.followee_id = f.follower_id), 1, 0) AS role from follow f left join user u on f.followee_id = u.uid where f.follower_id = #{query.followerId}
